name: For their entertainment
description:
!! If the game is too large for you, try zooming out in the browser. Thank you :) !!

An updated version with lots of improvements is here! For fairness we only have it as a the downloadable windows build and the original version still stays as the browser version for now.

For their entertainment is a small story driven top down action game. Fight, slow the time around you with your magic and be glorious!

We might have overscoped a little. Towards the end there was some time crunch involved (read: last minute before deadline submitted, after getting everything working just an hour earlier). The jam version definetily lacks polish, but it's hopefully still interesting to play.
